paper_abstract: An abstract theory on general synchronization of a system of several oscillators coupled by a medium is given. By generalized synchronization we mean the existence of an invariant manifold that allows a reduction in dimension. The case of a concrete system modeling the dynamics of a chemical solution on two containers connected to a third container is studied from the basics to arbitrary perturbations. Conditions under which synchronization occurs are given. Our theoretical results are complemented with a numerical study.
paper_title: GENERALIZED SYNCHRONIZATION IN A SYSTEM OF SEVERAL NON-AUTONOMOUS OSCILLATORS COUPLED BY A MEDIUM
